price: 104. Atu iimaanah keenih abta seecol hebeltô galtoy keenik esserta man tu, Nabiyow ama Qhuraan usuk kalah tanim hinna sinaamah kassis yakke kaa akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā tasaluhum ʿalayhi min ajrin in huwa illā dhik'run lil'ʿālamīna
